verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Verse 1
Here I stand
Forever in Your mighty hand
Living with Your promise
Written on my heart

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Verse 2
I am Yours
Surrendered wholly to You
You set me in Your family
Calling me Your own

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Chorus
Now I, I belong to You
All I need
Your spirit, Your word, Your truth
Hear my cry
My deep desire
To know You more

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Chorus 2
In Your name
I will lift my hands to the king
This anthem of praise I bring,
Heaven knows
I long to love You
With all I am
I belong to You
